Sentencas: An experimentally validated, two-dimensional, axisymmetric, numerical model of micro-tubular, single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell (MT-SC-SOFC) has been developed.
Titulo: Numerical modelling of methane-powered micro-tubular, single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The model incorporates methane full combustion, steam reforming, dry reforming and water-gas shift reaction followed by electrochemical oxidation of produced hydrogen within the anode.
Titulo: Numerical modelling of methane-powered micro-tubular, single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: On the cathode side, parasitic combustion of methane along with the electrochemical oxygen reduction is implemented.
Titulo: Numerical modelling of methane-powered micro-tubular, single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results show that the poor performance of single-chamber SOFC as compared to the conventional (dual-chamber) SOFC (in case of micro-tubes) is due to the mass transport limitation on the anode side.
Titulo: Numerical modelling of methane-powered micro-tubular, single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The gas velocity inside the micro-tube is far too low when compared to the gas-chamber inlet velocity.
Titulo: Numerical modelling of methane-powered micro-tubular, single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The electronic current density is also non-uniform over the cell length, mainly due to the short length of the anode current collector located at the cell outlet.
Titulo: Numerical modelling of methane-powered micro-tubular, single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Furthermore, the higher temperature near the cell edges is due to the methane combustion (very close to the cell inlet) and current collection point (at the cell outlet).
Titulo: Numerical modelling of methane-powered micro-tubular, single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Both of these locations could be sensitive to the silver current collecting wire as silver may rupture due to cell overheating.
Titulo: Numerical modelling of methane-powered micro-tubular, single-chamber solid oxide fuel cell
